mapper.select: SELECT s.saving_id, s.saving_name, s.saving_date, s.saving_amount, s.saving_target_id, st.saving_target_name FROM saving s INNER JOIN saving_target st using (saving_target_id) WHERE s.user_no = #{userNo} AND s.saving_date BETWEEN #{month} AND DATE_ADD(#{month}, INTERVAL 1 MONTH) ORDER BY s.saving_date desc ,saving_target_id

SELECT s.saving_id, s.saving_name, s.saving_date, s.saving_amount, s.saving_target_id FROM saving s WHERE s.user_no = #{userNo} AND s.saving_target_id IS NULL ORDER BY s.saving_date desc ,saving_target_id

SELECT s.saving_id, s.saving_name, s.saving_date, s.saving_amount, s.saving_target_id, st.saving_target_name FROM saving s INNER JOIN saving_target st using (saving_target_id) WHERE s.user_no = #{userNo} AND s.saving_id = #{savingId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO saving( user_no, saving_name, saving_amount, saving_date, saving_target_id ) VALUES( #{userNo}, #{savingName}, #{savingAmount}, #{savingDate}, #{savingTargetId} );
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM saving WHERE saving_id = #{savingId} AND user_no = #{userNo};
